title: A look at iRobot’s 35-year robotics journey
description:
From disaster zones, to oil spills, to the Great Pyramids of Giza, iRobot has taken its robot everywhere in its 35 years.

The post A look at iRobot’s 35-year robotics journey appeared first on The Robot Report.
